Title: EZX FOR 2021-2025 FORD BRONCO AND BRONCO RAPTOR
Description: EZX for 2021-2025 Ford Bronco 2.3L/2.7L/3.0L
Text1:
Take command of your Ford Bronco like never before. Designed for 2021–2025 models, the EZX Inline Module is the ultimate plug-and-play performance upgrade—delivering massive horsepower gains, unmatched control, and a fully customizable driving experience—all from your smartphone. Best of all, it won't leave a trace when removed, keeping your dealer warranty intact!

Power You Can Feel, Control at Your Fingertips

With just a tap in the EZX smartphone app (available for iOS & Android), you can adjust power levels on the fly. Whether you're daily driving, cruising, or tearing down the trail, dial in the perfect performance setting for your drive:

Adds up to 55hp/69tq at peak to 2.7L

Adds up to 26hp/69tq at peak to 2.3L

Add up to 45hp/77tq at peak to 3.0L Raptor

Smarter Driving, Deeper Control

The EZX isn’t just about raw power—it’s your truck’s new brain, giving you control over dozens of performance and convenience features. One Module. Total Domination. From better throttle response and improved fuel economy to effortless tuning from your phone, the EZX Inline Module transforms your Bronco into the beast it was meant to be. No hassle—just plug in and power up.
Text2:
7

This part is legal under the provisions of EPA’s Tampering Policy dated November 23rd, 2020. The company has reasonable basis (test results) to verify that this product allows the vehicle to operate within legal emissions standards and is therefore legal to be sold for on-street use in all states that accept the legal provisions of the Clean Air Act and the EPA Tampering Policy. This product is NOT LEGAL FOR SALE OR USE IN THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA. Testing with the California Air Resources Board, in order to achieve 50-state compliance, is pending with CARB. Once testing is complete with California, and an E.O. number is issued, this product will be updated to 50-state legal status.

Title: EZX FOR 2021-2025 FORD F150 AND RAPTOR
Description: EZX for 2021-2025 Ford 2.7L/3.5L
Text1:
Take command of your Ford F-150 EcoBoost like never before. Designed for 2021–2025 models, the EZX Inline Module is the ultimate plug-and-play performance upgrade—delivering massive horsepower gains, unmatched control, and a fully customizable driving experience—all from your smartphone. Best of all, it won't leave a trace when removed, keeping your dealer warranty intact!

Power You Can Feel, Control at Your Fingertips

With just a tap in the EZX smartphone app (available for iOS & Android), you can adjust power levels on the fly. Whether you're towing, cruising, or tearing down the trail, dial in the perfect performance setting for your drive:

Up to +65 HP and +90 TQ for the 3.5L EcoBoost

Up to +30 HP and +51 TQ for the 2.7L EcoBoost

Up to +45 HP and +68 TQ for the Raptor

Smarter Driving, Deeper Control

The EZX isn’t just about raw power—it’s your truck’s new brain, giving you control over dozens of performance and convenience features. One Module. Total Domination. From better throttle response and improved fuel economy to effortless tuning from your phone, the EZX Inline Module transforms your F-150 into the truck it was meant to be. No hassle—just plug in and power up.
Text2:
7

Title: FLOW FX DIRECT FIT MUFFLER
Description: Fits 20-25 GM 2500HD/3500HD 6.6L Gas Engine FFX Direct Fit Muffler Exhaust System, 409 stainles...
Text1: Flowmaster's® FlowFX Direct-Fit Muffler exhaust system for the 2020-2025 GM 2500HD and 3500HD trucks with the 6.6L gas engines gives you a great value packed way to help you customize your GM truck to your personality. This performance muffler system fits both 2/4 Wheel drive models and is manufactured from 409 stainless steel for years of trouble-free service and performance. Features include a 3.50-inch inlet pipe leading into a 409 stainless steel Flow FX series "straight-through" muffler for great sound and maximum performance and no drone. The muffler then connects to the factory tailpipe for a simple and effective performance upgrade. Max dyno gains of 7 hp and 5 lb-ft at the rear wheels. This results in better acceleration and towing performance.  The system uses all the factory hanger locations and connections for an easy installation that you can do at home. Kits include installation instructions and all necessary hardware.  Backed by Flowmaster's Lifetime Limited Warranty.
Text2:
5

This part is legal for sale or use on Emissions Controlled Vehicles, Uncontrolled (Non-Emissions Controlled) Vehicles, and Racing Use Only Vehicles because it does not affect vehicle emissions and is not covered by emissions regulations.

Title: FLASHCAL+ FOR JEEP WRANGLER/GLADIATOR
Description: Unlock your Jeep’s full potential with the all-new Flashcal+ for Wrangler & Gladiator. Easily...
Text1:
Take full control of your Jeep’s performance with the all-new Superchips Flashcal+, the industry’s easiest-to-use Jeep calibration tool. Designed with Jeep Wranlger and Gladiator enthusiasts in mind, Flashcal+ connects directly to your smartphone through an intuitive mobile app, giving you instant access to the settings and features that matter most on the trail or highway.

Flashcal+ is the first and only GPS-based tire size calibration tool in the industry, ensuring your Jeep Wrangler JK/JL or Gladiator JT speedometer stays accurate after tire size or gear ratio changes. No more guesswork, get precise speed readings and confidence in every adventure. With the powerful Crawl Screen, you can unlock real-time, on-the-fly control of your Jeep’s off-road features, including sway bar disconnects at higher speeds, axle lockers in high range, engine high idle for winching, Rock Lock braking, and even TPMS adjustments or disable.

Beyond tire size calibration, the Flashcal+ app delivers unmatched functionality at your fingertips. Read and clear diagnostic trouble codes, monitor live vehicle data, and customize your ride with simple on/off toggles for features like lighting configurations, engine auto start/stop, tire pressure thresholds, headlight control and more.

For those craving more performance, Flashcal+ offers an exclusive app-based tuning upgrade, a first in the industry. With just a few taps, you can unlock added horsepower, increased torque, optimized transmission shift strategies, and improved fuel economy, all without needing to visit a shop. This upgrade includes the required PCM swap for 2015+ models, making it easy to tune your Jeep with no vehicle downtime!

Whether you’re tackling rocky trails or cruising the highway, the Superchips Flashcal+ Jeep Calibration Tool delivers the precision, power, and flexibility Jeep owners demand. Upgrade your Wrangler or Gladiator today and experience the ultimate in performance, control, and convenience.

In-App Purchase Tuning Upgrade Options for 2015-2023 Wrangler JL 3.6 available within the app:

91/93 Octane Performance Tune - 17 RWHP/28 RWTQ

87 Octane Performance Tune - 10 RWHP/15 RWTQ

Perf Crawl Tune - 10 RWHP/10 RWTQ

MPG Booster Tune - Factory HP Level

Performance Transmission Tune for 8HP TCM

In-App Purchase Tuning Upgrade Options for 2018-2023 Wrangler JL 2.0T and 4xe available within the app:

91/93 Octane Performance Tune - 25 RWHP/35 RWTQ

87 Octane Performance Tune - 15 RWHP/20 RWTQ

In-App Purchase Tuning Upgrade Options for 2020-2024 Wrangler JL392 6.4 available within the app:

91/93 Octane Performance Tune - 15 RWHP/20 RWTQ

Perf Crawl Tune -10 RWHP/10 RWTQ

In-App Purchase Tuning Upgrade Options for 2020-2022 Gladiator JT 3.6 available within the app:

In-App Purchase Tuning Upgrade Options for 2012-2014 JK available within the app:

91/93 Octane Performance Tune - 15 RWHP/28RWTQ

87 Octane Performance Tune - 10 RWHP/15RWTQ

Perf Crawl Tune - 10RWHP/15RWTQ

Idle RPM - +/- 400 RPM, Top Speed Limiter - up to 185 MPH, Engine Rev Limiter - +600 RPM, Cooling Fan - Set Target ECT 150°-230°

In-App Purchase Tuning Upgrade Options for 2007-2011 JK Available after upgrading within app:

91/93 Octane Performance Tune - 18 RWHP/23RWTQ

87 Octane Performance Tune - 15 RWHP/18RWTQ

Perf Crawl Tune - 10RWHP/10RWTQ

Title: BILLET FRONT UPPER CONTROL ARM KIT - FRONT UPPER
Description: 2003-2024 Toyota 4Runner (Front Upper) (Note: Fits Vehicles With 1-3 (in) Front Lift)
Text1: Upgrade your Toyota with our cutting-edge Billet Aluminum Upper Control Arm. Designed to accommodate up to 4" lifts, it corrects camber and caster for a smoother ride. Crafted from CNC machined 6061 billet aluminum, it features a robust 1.25" hardened steel uniball for enhanced strength and articulation. Machined acetal copolymer bushings reduce deflection, improving handling. Stylish and durable, it boasts a black anodized finish with a laser-engraved logo on the control arm, and a striking gold anodized finish on the uniball cover, both protected by clear powder coat for ultimate UV resistance. The O-ring sealed uniball dust cover and included Grade 8 hardware ensure longevity and ease of installation. Plus, it's fully rebuildable, making it a sustainable and long-lasting upgrade for your rig!
Text2: Instructions - 100ADS-10076 Instructions.pdf

Title: CAN BUS DATA LOGGER
Description: The AEM logger is a compact and efficient data logging device designed for performance andflex...
Text1:
The AEM CAN logger has two configurable CAN ports. User definable Channel thresholds and/or the record

switch may be used to initiate logging. Unit connector is a DTM12 with a short flying lead terminated in a Type

A USB connector for attaching a USB memory stick. The AEM CAN logger has two configurable CAN ports

that allows for data acquisition on up to two separate CAN networks. The unit is Extremely compact and can

be mounted anywhere.

**Data logging channels can be custom defined**

Title: EZX + INSIGHT CTS3 KIT
Description: 2023-2025 Ford F250/F350/F450 - 6.7L Power Stroke Diesel
model: F-250 SUPER DUTY (3)F-350 SUPER DUTY (3)F-450 SUPER DUTY (3)
Text1:
The Edge EZX for 2023–2025 Ford 6.7L Power Stroke is the next-generation inline performance module engineered for today’s most powerful diesel trucks. Designed for simple, plug-and-play installation, the EZX connects directly to your factory system in minutes with no cutting or splicing required. Once installed, you’ll unlock on-the-fly power level adjustments using the intuitive Edge smartphone app, giving you total control of your truck’s performance right from your phone.

Whether you’re towing heavy loads, daily driving, or pushing your Power Stroke to the limit, the EZX is built to deliver. Enjoy instant throttle response, improved drivability, and up to 1,200 ft-lbs of torque to the tires. Engineered to be emissions safe and warranty-friendly with no trace when removed, the EZX offers safe, reliable power without compromise.

Take your 2023–2025 Ford Power Stroke SO or HO to the next level with the Edge EZX, the ultimate solution for diesel enthusiasts who want performance, efficiency, and convenience in one powerful package.

For the absolute best drivers experience, pair EZX with our Insight CTS3 to stayed informed with everything going on under the hood. Our EZX + Insight CTS3 kits give you everything you need to stay 'in the know'. Kit also includes vehicle specific CTS3 dash mount.
Text2:
7

Title: AIRSPEED GLOVES
Description: Large - Alloy - SFI 3.3/5
Text1:
Designed to match Simpson’s successful Airspeed SFI-5 racing suit, the Airspeed Racing Gloves are the best value in the Simpson lineup. Every feature of these gloves have been engineered to provide the comfortable fit Simpson is known for, with high-quality and breathable Nomex construction and a striking design aligned with our Airspeed racing family. With these gloves, You Got This.

NEW: All customers can customize these gloves with their own graphics and we can heat press them for an extra cost (call for details). Rated to SFI 3.3/5 and available in 4 colors (black, alloy, blue, or white).

Title: SUPERCOIL GLOVES
Description: Large - Alloy - SFI 3.3/5
Text1: Supercoil safety gear is for our most demanding drivers. With a comfortable fit and pre-curved fingers made of soft Nomex construction you're ready to duel for a podium. Pull on the red Simpson tab to secure the glove on your hands and the lightweight silicone graphics will secure your grip on the wheel. With these gloves, You Got This. Rated to SFI 3.3/5 and available in 3 colors (black/red, alloy/black, or navy/red).

Title: 6T CALIPER ROCK GUARD (PER CALIPER)
Description: Fits Baer 6T Calipers (Sold per Caliper)
FuelType: 2 Caliper Guards, 2 Bleeder Guards, Mounting Hardware
Text1: These caliper rock guards are manufactured from .075" thick, 316 stainless steel mount directly to the Baer 6T caliper and are designed to protect the caliper and bleeder screw from rocks and other debris. Each Rock Guard kit includes 2 caliper end guards, 2 bleeder screw guards and mounting hardware and are sold per caliper. New brake kits would require 2 Rock Guard kits, 1 per caliper.

Title: 13.5" 6T FRONT BRAKE KIT, MONSTER GREEN, SZ
Description: Fits 10-25 Ford F150 2/4wd Trucks (Incl. Raptor)
Text1: This system features the 6-piston, 6T caliper mounted to a 13.5", 1-piece slotted and zinc-plated rotor. The 6T caliper has D.O.T compliant dust and weather seals and uses the popular D1247 pad type. Rotors are purpose cast using only premium materials and feature a curved vane design for optimum cooling, consistant braking and reduced brake fade. All mounting brackets, stainless braided hoses* and hardware are also included. The 13.5" 6T Brake kits are designed to fit most 17” or larger wheels. NOTE: Hoses included are for stock height vehicles, lifted vehicles may require longer hoses.
Text2:
Baer Brakes Replacement Pads for Baer 6S/6R & XTR Monoblock Calipers
Replacement pads used in all Baer Brakes Extreme & Extreme+ brake kits using the 6S, 6R or XTR monoblock calipers. Also fits early billet Alcon 2pc caliper.
Part# D1247R
$167.35

Title: AMERICAN THUNDER CAT-BACK EXHAUST SYSTEM
Description: Fits 2024-2026 GM 1500 6.2-Liter, American Thunder Cat-Back exhaust system, with active valve, ...
Text1: Flowmaster's® American Thunder® Cat-back exhaust system for the 2024 to 2026 GM 1500 trucks with the 6.2-liter engine is a great way to customize your Silverado or Sierra to your personality. This performance exhaust system fits both 2/4 Wheel drive models and is manufactured from 409 stainless steel for years of trouble-free service and performance. Features include a 3.50-inch inlet pipe leading into a specialty tuned 50 Series HD style muffler for great sound and maximum performance. This cat-back system has dual 2.5-inch mandrel-bent tailpipes that exit in the bumper cut-out locations, with custom quad exit 4.0-inch black ceramic tips for a great performance look. Included in this cat-back system is active valve control with an integrated turndown.  This allows you to control the factory valve from the dash with the different drive modes for full control of your sound level.  Run the valve closed in the Normal drive mode, or open the valve in Sport or Off-Road mode for maximum sound.  Max dyno gains of 15 hp and 13 lb-ft at the rear wheels deliver power you can feel.  These systems use all the factory hanger locations and connections for an easy installation that you can do at home. Kit include installation instructions and all necessary hardware.  Backed by Flowmaster's Lifetime Limited Warranty.
Text2:
5

This part is legal for sale or use on Emissions Controlled Vehicles, Uncontrolled (Non-Emissions Controlled) Vehicles, and Racing Use Only Vehicles because it does not affect vehicle emissions and is not covered by emissions regulations.

Title: 2025+ RAM 1500 PERFORMANCE PACKAGE
Description: Front Coilovers / Rear Shocks / Cat-Back Exhaust / Performance Tuner Module / Front Brake Rotor...
submodel: BIG HORN (1)LARAMIE (1)LARAMIE SPORT (1)LIMITED (1)LIMITED LONGHORN (1)LONE STAR (1)REBEL (1)RHO (1)SPECIAL SERVICE (1)TRADESMAN (1)TRADESMAN HFE (1)TUNGSTEN (1)WARLOCK (1)Show All
Text1:
ADS has been working hard to bring innovation and incredible products to your Ram 1500 platform. Gear up for your next off-road adventure with complete Performance Package upgrades from ADS. ADS delivers performance systems from exhaust to brakes, tuners, suspension, and more. Our products are engineered to work together to ensure you have everything you need to have fun on and off the road!

Save 10% off and get free freight shipping on all performance packages now! Financing options available.

WHY GET A PACKAGE?

We understand the building a modified truck in stages is often preferred for various reasons. Not knowing how deep into the modification journey you may go or simply for financial reasons are common justifications for a measured approach. However, often when building in stages, parts are mixed and matched that were not designed to interact with one another which can lead to sub-par results and unhappiness with a vehicle you should be enjoying. By purchasing and installing popular curated packages of parts that were all designed to work with one another you bypass these common faults and receive a complete solution you can enjoy to the fullest from day one.

This comprehensive performance upgrade kit is tailored for 2025+ Ram 1500 pickups. The suspension upgrades feature ADS Racing Shocks Mesa 2.5 Series shocks, which are larger than stock, providing increased fluid capacity to prevent shock fade and deliver exceptional off-road durability combined with commuter comfort. The kit also includes a Outlaw Cat-Back Exhaust System, known for its hand-welded 409 stainless steel construction, offering an aggressive yet moderate tone. Additionally, this package is equipped with a Pulsar Cat6, a smartphone controlled app that allows you to add up to 78 RWHP (Hight Output models). Finally, Big Claw Performance Rotors are included, designed for improved braking performance and enhanced cooling to ensuring safety and reliability during high-performance driving.

Title: AMERICAN THUNDER DIRECT FIT MUFFLER
Description: Fits 2025 - 2026 RAM 1500 3.0L High Output, American Thunder Direct-Fit muffler exhaust system,...
Text1: Flowmaster's® American Thunder Direct-Fit Muffler exhaust system for the 2025 - 2026 RAM 1500 with the 3.0-liter High Output engine gives you a great value packed way to help you customize your RAM 1500 to your personality. This performance muffler system fits both 2/4 Wheel drive models and is manufactured from 409 stainless steel for years of trouble-free service and performance. Features include a 3.00-inch inlet pipe leading into a 409 stainless steel Super 10 based muffler for great sound and maximum performance. The dual exit muffler then connects to the factory tailpipes for a simple and effective performance upgrade. Max dyno gains of 13 hp and 12 lb-ft at the rear wheels deliver power you can feel. The system uses all the factory hanger locations and connections for an easy installation that you can do at home. Kits include installation instructions and all necessary hardware.  Backed by Flowmaster's Lifetime Limited Warranty.
Text2:

Title: MESA 2.5" SHOCKS - REAR
Description: 2019-2024 Ram 1500 (Rear) (Note: Fits Vehicles With 0-2.5 (in) Rear Lift, Without Air Suspension)
Text1:
Upgrade your Silverado 1500, Ram 1500/2500, Ford F-250/F-350, or Toyota Tacoma, Tundra, and 4Runner with our direct-fit, OEM replacement suspension solutions. These premium shock absorbers are designed for maximum durability and performance, featuring a UV-stable ceramic powder-coated steel shock body and black anodized billet aluminum top and bottom caps. Hard-chrome plated steel shock shafts provide superior corrosion resistance, while spacers machined from 304 stainless steel further enhance durability. Filled with premium full synthetic shock oil, the shock absorber incorporates an internal floating piston (IFP) to ensure consistent damping performance, improved responsiveness, and increased longevity. The large bore 2.50-inch shock body increases fluid capacity, effectively resisting shock fade to boost off-road performance. Fully rebuildable, this shock absorber is the ultimate upgrade for enhancing your vehicle's suspension system.

Now that you’ve got the look and performance with your New ADS Mesa shocks, don’t overlook the other off-road must-haves! Round out your build with industry best exhaust from Flowmaster, custom shifters, and heavy-duty differential covers from B&M.
Text2: Instructions - IS-63; RAM, 2009-'24 RAM 1500 Truck, Rear; SB Shocks MESA-10144.pdf
Field2: Instructions - IS-63; RAM, 2009-'24 RAM 1500 Truck, Rear; SB Shocks MESA-10144.pdf

Title: MESA 2.5" COILOVERS - FRONT
Description: 2024-2025 Toyota Land Cruiser (Front) (Note: Provides 0-2.5 (in) Front Lift)
Text1:
Upgrade your Silverado 1500, Ram 1500/2500, Ford F-250/F-350, or Toyota Tacoma, Tundra, Land Cruiser and 4Runner with our direct-fit, OEM replacement suspension solutions. These premium shock absorbers are designed for maximum durability and performance, featuring a UV-stable ceramic powder-coated steel shock body and black anodized billet aluminum top and bottom caps. Hard-chrome plated steel shock shafts provide superior corrosion resistance, while spacers machined from 304 stainless steel further enhance durability. Filled with premium full synthetic shock oil, the shock absorber incorporates an internal floating piston (IFP) to ensure consistent damping performance, improved responsiveness, and increased longevity. The large bore 2.50-inch shock body increases fluid capacity, effectively resisting shock fade to boost off-road performance. Fully rebuildable, this shock absorber is the ultimate upgrade for enhancing your vehicle's suspension system.

Now that you’ve got the look and performance with your New ADS Mesa shocks, don’t overlook the other off-road must-haves! Round out your build with industry best exhaust from Flowmaster, custom shifters, and heavy-duty differential covers from B&M.

Title: PENCIL COIL 07-20 INFINITI/NISSAN 3.5L
Description: Engineered to outperform, these coils are designed to help you unlock more power and efficiency...
Text1:
Delivering up to 10% more spark energy in a compact OEM-style package, these coils provide a true drop-in performance upgrade—no modifications required. Experience enhanced ignition performance with the convenience of a direct-fit solution.

Engineered for performance, these coils are manufactured using advanced bobbin technology with specialized silicone magnetic steel cores and precision-wrapped windings. This design ensures optimal resistance and accurate turn ratios, delivering consistent, high-energy spark while enhancing thermal stability and mechanical strength for reliable performance under demanding conditions.
Text2:
2

This part is legal for sale and use on Emissions Controlled Vehicles when used in accordance with the manufacturers application guide because it is a direct or consolidated replacement part.

The following vehicles are considered Emissions Controlled Vehicles:

1966 and newer U.S. manufactured California Certified vehicles
1968 and newer U.S. manufactured Federally Certified vehicles
1968 and newer Foreign manufactured vehicle
